column4: Hello. I left the house thinking I could SSH into my public facing box, then SSH into the studio box next to it. I can SSH into my public box, but I can't SSH into the studio, as SSHd isn't installed. Is there ANY other way to get into it or install SSHd remotely?
At the very least I need to be able to access a drive on that box that may or may not be shared with the network
Would telnet be of any use to me?
only if you had the telnet service allready installed on the box you are telneting to.
